channel.title: Blogs on Marcus Hunter
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on Marcus Hunter

item.title: Python
item.description: I really enjoyed learning about filtering in Python. Going forward, I know this will be of use for me especially in research when I need to compare subsets of big groups of data. Example: string2="Jan 13 00:48:59: DROP service 68->67(udp) from 213.92.153.167 to 69.43.107.219, prefix: \"spoof iana-0/8\" \ (in: eth0 69.43.112.233(38:f8:b7:90:45:92):68 -> 217.70.100.113(00:21:87:79:9c:d9):67 UDP len:576 ttl:64) \ Jan 13 12:02:48: ACCEPT service dns from 74.125.186.208 to firewall(pub-nic-dns), prefix: \"none\" \ (in: eth0 74.
